statements: DELETE FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE system_name = 'Server Room' AND maintenance_date = '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' AND maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM SecuritySystems WHERE system_id = 101 AND system_name = 'Main Entrance Security'
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_id IN (SELECT maintenance_id FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_date < '2021-01-01')
DELETE FROM SecuritySystemMaintenanceHistory WHERE system_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance';
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE system_id = 201 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_assignments WHERE technician_id = 101 AND completion_date < '2021-12-01';
